item.title: 055-20241128-IntoToTheStorm
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session Log as we are sailing into the storm we see one of the boats out of nowhere coming up on us.

item.title: 054-20241120-GoWestYoungMan
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session Log one of the ships turns slightly towards us or maybe towards the storm the storm is directly west of us and heading towards us some.

item.title: 053-20241024-SailingTheWideSeas
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session Log We decide to head due west for a while. #razortooth_mike needs some help sailing.

item.title: 052-20241010-Leavingtheisland
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session After having an amazing night on mushrooms I am convinced I know which direction to head to find sorren which is dead west.
